name: Chasm Climb (sndein)
description:
A small grappling hook platformer with Game Boy aesthetics.

This first demo has thrilling features such as:

  • a whole five levels
  • no music
  • sound effects though
  • uh

default controls

KeyboardActionControllerArrow Keys
MovementD-PadAJumpADHookXReturnStart Game
StartF11Toggle Fullscreen

F10Toggle Integer Scaling

These and some other settings can be changed in the config.lua located in the save directory.

Refer to

https://love2d.org/wiki/love.filesystem

https://love2d.org/wiki/KeyConstant

https://love2d.org/wiki/GamepadButton

in case you need to do that.
